inclusion.criterion: singleton pregnancy with severe features of preeclampsia
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: systolic blood pressure of 160 mm Hg or higher, or diastolic blood pressure of 110 mm Hg or higher on two occasions at least 4 hours apart while the patient is on bed rest (unless antihypertensive therapy is initiated before this time)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: impairment of liver function as indicated by abnormally elevated blood concentrations of liver enzymes (to twice normal concentration), severe persistent right upper quadrant or epigastric pain unresponsive to medication and not accounted for by alternative diagnoses, or both
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: progressive renal insufficiency (serum creatinine concentration greater 97 µmol/L or a doubling of the serum creatinine concentration in the absence of other renal disease)
inclusion.label: unknown
